name: Project Nephilim
description: Project Nephilim is a Tower defense game that was built for the Gamedev.tv Game jam in just 10 days! I worked as a solo developer to test out what I have learned so far about making games. the idea was to have the character use 3rd person combat and have multiple levels but after a few issues I had to reduce scope and couldn't add in the extra fun features I wanted to. I may come back to this in the future to really finish what this game should be.
